AppWorkout java ,SQL

App helps home workout instructors schedule exercises for suitable subjects. By calculating BMI from height and weight

Subjects were assigned to 3 groups with Bodyfat (bodyfat calculated from BMI). For each group, there is a corresponding schedule set up by a person who specializes in training

source code

GAME RPG Game created in java language

The game has players and monsters items when fighting monsters. The game consists of three Maps, players can move between the maps. To win the game, the player must collect enough keys by fighting monsters of each map, when collecting enough keys and going to the end of the map.

The player loses when he runs out of health during the battle or the execution time runs out.

source code
